resources.string:
- All released expansions included. 
- Trait and attack type filtering. 
- Enable/Disable expansions via settings. 
- App in English/Spanish. 
- Complete monster stats.

\tIn most of the encounters, the overlord may add a group of monsters belonging to one of the adventure traits. However, filtering monsters from the monster deck is a tedious task. \n\tThe goal of this app is to make that filtering process quick and easy, helping in the selection of the monster group that fits your needs.
